title: Open VSX Registry Responds to Leaked Tokens and Malicious Extension Incident

content.raw: The Open VSX team and Eclipse Foundation have addressed a significant security incident involving leaked authentication tokens and malicious extensions on their popular code marketplace. The organization has now contained the situation and outlined concrete steps to prevent future attacks. Earlier this month, security researchers at Wiz identified several developer tokens that had been accidentally […] The post Open VSX Registry Responds to Leaked Tokens and Malicious Extension Incident appeared first on GBHackers Security | #1 Globally Trusted Cyber Security News Platform.
